Texts.Chs: 给所有电子人卫兵的消息
Texts.Eng: A Message to all Glitch Guards

Texts.Chs: 我们的善意只能维持这么久。他们正在腐蚀我们的许多人，并切断他们与中央意识的联系。因此，任何在指定安全区发现的弃儿必须立即被逮捕并送往实验室重新利用。
Texts.Eng: Our goodwill can only last so long. They are corrupting many of our number and severing their link with the central consciousness. As such, any Outcast spotted in a designated safe zone must be immediately arrested and sent to the laboratories for repurposing.

Texts.Chs: 我们远远地容忍了那些被遗弃的人，因为我们知道他们不会渗透到我们最珍贵的圣所，我们的城堡，我们的家园，我们的地下拳击俱乐部。这些地方到处都是被遗弃的人。他们闲逛，说话，发表意见。这令人不安而极具破坏性。
Texts.Eng: We have tolerated the Outcasts at a distance, with the understanding that they do not infiltrate our most precious of sanctums; our castles, our homes, our underground fight clubs. Outcasts have infiltrated all these places. They loiter around, saying words, and having opinions. It is disconcerting and disruptive.
